opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we improve the event sign-up process to ensure completion without frustration?
opportunities.evidence: I have on occasion... it just wouldn't complete. Like when I was signing up for something, it didn't. And so then I just gave up and came back later.
opportunities.user_need: Users need a reliable and seamless sign-up experience.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we enhance the user experience for searching and exploring event attendees?
opportunities.evidence: I go to the directory... to look people up... just to see what they say about themselves.
opportunities.user_need: Users need a more efficient and informative way to look up event attendees.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we encourage app downloads and usage among users who primarily use the website?
opportunities.evidence: I don’t think I’ve downloaded the app.
opportunities.user_need: Users need clarity on the benefits of using the app versus the website.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we streamline the directory access to improve the usability of attendee information?
opportunities.evidence: I go to the directory... to look people up just to have some idea of... who they are.
opportunities.user_need: Users need easy and quick access to relevant attendee information.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we provide real-time updates on event registration and status?
opportunities.evidence: I just gave up and came back later.
opportunities.user_need: Users need reassurance or updates on their registration process.
